casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Barry Wayne MARCUS. No. 177P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Steven F. Bryant, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of April 2005 by Defendant for Permission to File a Reply to the State's Response to Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
